metadata.Title: CVE-2019-5068 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An exploitable shared memory permissions vulnerability exists in the functionality of X11 Mesa 3D Graphics Library 19.1.2. An attacker can access the shared memory without any specific permissions to trigger this vulnerability.

notes.Note: sbeattie> mesa and its build dependencies have been updated for the HWE stack in bionic, so to fix this there will require no-change rebuilds in the security pocket for libdrm, libclc, wayland, and llvm-toolchain-9.

criterions.comment: mesa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
